details.sectionContent: Come at once if convenient â€” if inconvenient come all the same.
The master of all detective games is here to test you to the extreme. A challenge that will leave you wanting for more.
Participants get clues to places, observe those places and answer a questionnaire based on what they observe. Also there will be questions based on general knowledge.
This is a surprise round to test how good you are on your feet.
Finally what you came here for - The Murder Mystery. Solve it, you win.
